statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerLoyaltyProgramData WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, join_date FROM CustomerLoyaltyProgramData ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_points FROM CustomerLoyaltyProgramData WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM CustomerLoyaltyProgramData WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, last_purchase FROM CustomerLoyaltyProgramData ORDER BY last_purchase ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_points, join_date FROM CustomerLoyaltyProgramData WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerLoyaltyProgramData WHERE last_purchase BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY last_purchase ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_points, last_purchase FROM CustomerLoyaltyProgramData WHERE total_points < 50 AND last_purchase < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, join_date FROM CustomerLoyaltyProgramData WHERE join_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, MAX(total_points) AS max_points FROM CustomerLoyaltyProgramData;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_id, join_date, transaction_amount FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_id = 101;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT loyalty_id, customer_id, join_date FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) as avg_transaction_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) as max_transaction_amount FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_id, join_date FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE transaction_amount > 500 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01' AND join_date <= '2022-03-31' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM retention_rates WHERE membership_level = 'Gold');
SELECT transaction_date, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM loyalty_program_data GROUP BY transaction_date HAVING SUM(transaction_amount) > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, retention_score FROM retention_rates WHERE assessment_date = '2022-06-30' ORDER BY retention_score DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchases, membership_level FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE total_purchases > 100;
SELECT customer_id, join_date, points_earned, points_redeemed FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC, join_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchases FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE points_earned > 1000;
SELECT loyalty.customer_id, loyalty.membership_level, analysis.retention_rate FROM loyalty_program_data AS loyalty JOIN program_analysis AS analysis ON loyalty.customer_id = analysis.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE membership_level IN ('Gold', 'Platinum') AND total_purchases > 5000 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM loyalty_program_customers ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT year, retention_rate FROM retention_rates WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM loyalty_program_customers
SELECT * FROM loyalty_points_usage WHERE points_used > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers JOIN loyalty_points_usage ON loyalty_program_customers.customer_id = loyalty_points_usage.customer_id WHERE points_used < 50
SELECT year, retention_rate FROM retention_rates WHERE retention_rate >= 70
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_type FROM customer_engagement ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM loyalty_program_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 3 AND feedback_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM loyalty_program_customers JOIN loyalty_program_transactions ON loyalty_program_customers.customer_id = loyalty_program_transactions.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM loyalty_program_customers JOIN customer_feedback ON loyalty_program_customers.customer_id = customer_feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
